pages.description:
You stand before a watchtower, caked in snow.

There does not seem to be any signs of life, with the tower standing as still as the air around it.

You climb and reach the top of the tower, and you are greeted with a room.

It seems mostly empty, save for a few bunches of paper and bits of furniture in shambles.
Quickly scanning through the contents of the papers, you find what seems to be a map of the area. What luck.

NOTE:
The map shows you the layout of the area and any potential points of interest.

Press "M" or click on the Map icon to the left to open/close it.
